price: 165. Batindami baye bazali bapesi sango malamu, mpe bakebisi mpona etumbu mpo ete bato bazala lisusu na likambo ya koloba te liboso na Allah sima ya boyei ya batindami, mpe Allah atonda bokasi mpe bwanya.
arabic: رُّسُلٗا مُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةُۢ بَعۡدَ ٱلرُّسُلِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rusulan mubashirīna wamundhirīna li-allā yakūna lilnnāsi ʿalā al-lahi ḥujjatun baʿda al-rusuli wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
